# This file is generated by redf

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
project(nexus_endpoints)

find_package(backward_ros REQUIRED)
find_package(rclcpp REQUIRED)
find_package(rclcpp_action REQUIRED)
find_package(ament_cmake REQUIRED)
find_package(control_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(nexus_alarm_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(nexus_calibration_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(nexus_detector_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(nexus_dispenser_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(nexus_motion_planner_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(nexus_orchestrator_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(nexus_transporter_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(trajectory_msgs REQUIRED)

add_library(nexus_endpoints INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(nexus_endpoints INTERFACE
  ${control_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${nexus_alarm_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${nexus_calibration_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${nexus_detector_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${nexus_dispenser_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${nexus_motion_planner_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${nexus_orchestrator_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${nexus_transporter_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${trajectory_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)
target_link_libraries(nexus_endpoints INTERFACE rclcpp::rclcpp rclcpp_action::rclcpp_action
  ${control_msgs_TARGETS}
  ${nexus_alarm_msgs_TARGETS}
  ${nexus_calibration_msgs_TARGETS}
  ${nexus_detector_msgs_TARGETS}
  ${nexus_dispenser_msgs_TARGETS}
  ${nexus_motion_planner_msgs_TARGETS}
  ${nexus_orchestrator_msgs_TARGETS}
  ${nexus_transporter_msgs_TARGETS}
  ${trajectory_msgs_TARGETS}
)
set_target_properties(nexus_endpoints PROPERTIES PUBLIC_HEADER nexus_endpoints.hpp)

install(
  TARGETS nexus_endpoints
  EXPORT nexus_endpoints
  PUBLIC_HEADER
    DESTINATION include/nexus_endpoints
  INCLUDES DESTINATION include/nexus_endpoints
)
ament_export_targets(nexus_endpoints)
ament_export_dependencies(
  rclcpp_action
  control_msgs
  nexus_alarm_msgs
  nexus_calibration_msgs
  nexus_detector_msgs
  nexus_dispenser_msgs
  nexus_motion_planner_msgs
  nexus_orchestrator_msgs
  nexus_transporter_msgs
  trajectory_msgs
)

ament_package()
